msbt.message: Curious what I have in my pockets, darling? I'll bet you are. Your restless brain CRIES OUT to know! Well, suffer no longer, poor brain! It's a festive wreath, and it's for you. More specifically, it's for your door!
Obviously you can place it wherever you likeâ€”I wouldn't presume to tell you how to decorate, .
Ah, but it looks like your door will have to wait a bit, because your pockets are full, ! No need to fret, dear. I'll hold on to this, and you can come see me when you're traveling a bit lighter.
